Windows 95-key generator

A simple Python file that generated Windows 95 keys. (Yes, it's that easy.)



Between-Disc-Guild

A node.js script that uses discord.js and guilded.js to send messages back and forth between a Discord and a Guilded channel.



"Scratchertale"

A (pretty terrible) game that (technically) uses Undertale's battle system (actually just the part where you dodge attacks but for 10 minutes straight).
